title: This Portfolio
summary: This Portfolio has been an ongoing project for several months
details: I decided to go with React + vite (JS) with Tailwindcss for my Portfolio as we had just been learning React when we were gonna start building our Portfolios.
The design part of the portfolio started in August of 2025, using Figma to set up Wireframes and over the course of the month experimenting and building out our designs.
Portfolios are ever evolving, so even though I've made it during my stay at Kodehode, I'll still continue to update and tweak it going forward.
